Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Grand Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior glazed streaky brown with trace of decorative motif in added white; exterior: part of two brown bands, reserved below; trace of elaborate rosette in added colour on lower brown band.
Curator's comments: The light on dark technique employed here with the rosette on the exterior surface is not frequent. For another example see Lemos no. 814 from Kavala.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1938) (phase 2)
